themes: Exposure to unfamiliar creative and cultural expressions
Overemphasis on STEM at the expense of the arts
Creativity as a driver of innovation and progress
Need for unexpected encounters with the arts
key_phrases: encourages exposure to and exploration of a diversity of creative and cultural expression
beyond people only looking for things they already know they enjoy
different types of music they may have never heard before
bringing various forms of creative expression together in parallel experiences
society has shifted focus so much recently on 'STEM' activities
forgotten what inspires all of those 'practical' disciplines
creativity of thought that drives humanity to innovate, progress, and make an enduring impact
brings all the possibilities of creative expression out for unexpected encounters
barriers_identified: Limited exposure to unfamiliar creative and cultural expressions
solutions_proposed: Develop a program that encourages exposure to and exploration of diverse creative and cultural expressions
Create events that bring various forms of creative expression together in parallel experiences
Develop materials and programs that foster unexpected encounters with creative expression
